comic2-1050.jpg.description: Unusually, the image is a JPEG rather than a PNG. It's because the image contains a steganographic message encoded with steghide (https://steghide.sourceforge.net; web UI at http://futureboy.us/stegano/decinput.html). The message is a green monochromatic photo of a T-Rex sculpture saying "boooooooooooooners".

comic2-2087.png.description: The transcript reads the panels normally, left-to-right, but this particular comic should be read right-to-left: panels 3, 2, 1, 6, 5, 4

comic2-2351.png.description: The default version of a double-feature choose-your-own comic

comic2-2351-2.png.description: The mouse-over version of a double-feature choose-your-own comic

comic2-THISWASVERYDIFFICULTTOACCOMPLISHP.description: The initial "one-time" part of a double-feature comic

comic2-2976.png.description: The final part of a double-feature comic

comic2-3523.gif.description: The image is animated and some of God's lines change after some time; the transcript lists both versions
